thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: My new home away from home
thread.title_full: My new home away from home - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kristen W
title: My new home away from home
text: I stayed here this week for a 5 night stay for work. I work in the garment district so it was perfectly located. I usually stay in time square or up at a boutique hotel on 44th, but I wanted to find somewhere consistent for my upcoming travels and am happy to say that this was a win. Trip is booked for a week from now until July. The blond at the front desk was the best and the others were nice too! The best part is that the rooms are updated, clean and there is a fridge!
